wiki.content:
"Take a Bow" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 Chart and U.S. Billboard Adult Contemporary Chart in the Winter of 1995.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Take a Bow" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 Chart and U.S. Billboard Adult Contemporary Chart in the Winter of 1995.
